definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The cook baked a cake . The cake was baked too long. The cake is as hard as rock.
sentences.chinese: 厨子烤了一块饼，烤饼的时间太长了，硬得像石头。

sentences.english: The cook baked a cake. The cake was baked too long. The cake is as hard as rock.
sentences.chinese: 厨子烤了一块饼，饼烤的时间太长，硬得像石头。

sentences.english: By the crook, the cook saw through a cookbook before production nailed cookies.
sentences.chinese: 在溪边，厨子在做钩形饼干之前查阅了一本食谱。

sentences.english: No scampering or scurrying. Understand, Little Chef?
sentences.chinese: 不许上下乱窜，懂吗，小厨子？

sentences.english: The cook put down his knife and told Master Wu about this strange turtle.
sentences.chinese: 厨子放下刀，告诉吴少爷这只奇龟。

sentences.english: By the crook, the cook looked through a cookbook before makinghooked cookies.
sentences.chinese: 在溪边，厨子在做钩形饼干之前查阅了一利食谱。

sentences.english: She is down with la grippe and so is her cook .
sentences.chinese: 她在患流行性感冒，她家的厨子也病倒了。

sentences.english: A chef who was traveling with the group was also hurt, so everyone started cooking, Mr. Dhao said.
sentences.chinese: 随行而来的厨师也受了伤，所以每个人都成了厨子。

sentences.english: George went back through the swinging door into the kitchen and untied Nick and the cook.
sentences.chinese: 乔治从转门走进厨房，把尼克跟厨子两个人松开了绑。

sentences.english: I want a cook who can make good broth and cabbages.
sentences.chinese: 我要一位能做好的清汤，善烧青菜的好厨子。

sentences.english: Like many cooks, Dunkel likes to make a recipe her own.
sentences.chinese: 与许多厨子一样，邓克尔喜欢自己定食谱。

sentences.english: Huang Dehuan told the cooks to take the turtle to a river and let it go.
sentences.chinese: 黄德环叫厨子们把乌龟带去河边放生。

sentences.english: I wasn’t kidding about the French cooks.
sentences.chinese: 我可没有在拿法国厨子开涮。

sentences.english: Hey, isn't that Feng Yuan, the famous cook?
sentences.chinese: 嘿，那不就是那个有名的厨子冯远吗？

sentences.english: The cook, he makes his knife so sharp To stab it then into my heart.
sentences.chinese: 那厨子正把他的刀磨亮，就要把我的命儿丧。

sentences.english: Again the writer and the sailor rowed while the cook took water out of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 记者和水手又划了起来，厨子仍然往船外淘水。

definition: to be in charge of the cooking/to be the chef/head cook/chef
to help with farm work/casual laborer
